Import MPP message: Import an MPP file to view the project timeline and start tracking your tasks with this professional Gantt chart view.
Original schedule info: • Orange bars show original planned schedule vs. current actual schedule
Hover baseline info: • Hover over baseline bars to see variance details
Variance color info: • 🟢 Ahead = Task finishing earlier than baseline | 🟡 Behind = Task delayed from baseline
Progress percentage info: • Percentages show actual work completed vs. planned work
Variance indicator info: • Variance indicators compare progress to time-based expectations
Critical milestone info: • Critical milestones pulse when behind schedule
